name: The Goracle
description: Classic RPG Dungeon Crawler. Save the kingdom from the creature of the great abyss.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
recommended_requirements: Graphics: OpenGL ES w.o hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration.  (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50), iOS 8.0, Android 4.4.4*
